entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near midnight.
